title: MrDave
author: MrDave
content: Do anyone investing in dfi.money these days?

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: MrDave on June 28, 2022, 05:38:43 AMDo anyone investing in dfi.money these days?Your domain name is unique and many will want to buy it, but at this time it is not longer attractive. two years ago, domains related to DE-centralized finance and tokens were of real value.Monetary tightening policies, the collapse of cryptocurrency prices, the floundering and failure of many projects will make the value of the domain at its lowest value.Try to sell when the markets turn green.

comments.author: harapan
comments.body: Try joining some resourceful twitter space and get some solid information about decentralized finance. Take this personal, whatever suggestions you get should be taken and go take another proper check over them. They should make good waves in the near by future, so it's good one you're taking a good look into them.Â  If your into it how well and how far can they thus go!
